a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Polio case and death rates in the United States
The reported rates are per 100,000 US population and include both wild- and vaccine-derived poliovirus infections
that occurred indigenously and as imported cases.
Data source: Our World In Data based on US Public Health Service; US Center for Disease Control; and WHO
